ModMetaData.name: Devilish Chocolate
ModMetaData.author: CrunchyDuck
ModMetaData.description: Causes chocolate to be listed as a drug, in name only. This does not add any addictive properties. The main purpose of this mod is to add chocolate as an option in the "drugs" management tab. However, as a side effect, this means teetotalers will refuse to eat chocolate.
